title: Amazon Sponsored Display Campaign Daily Report
description: Daily performance report for an Amazon Sponsored Display Campaign

Date.description: Date of the report in Unix timestamp format

Status.description: Current status of the campaign, e.g., 'PAUSED'

Currency.description: Currency code for the financial values in the report

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the Sponsored Display Campaign

Portfolio_name.description: Name of the portfolio associated with the campaign, or '-' if not applicable

14_Day_Detail_Page_Views__DPV.description: Total number of detail page views in the last 14 days

Spend.description: Total spending on the campaign in the specified currency

14_Day_Total_Orders__#.description: Total number of orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Units__#.description: Total number of units sold in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Sales_.description: Total sales in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Orders__#.description: Total number of new-to-brand orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Sales.description: Total new-to-brand sales in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Units__#.description: Total number of new-to-brand units sold in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Orders__#_-__Click.description: Total number of orders within clicks in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Units__#_-__Click.description: Total number of units within clicks in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Sales_-__Click.description: Total sales within clicks in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Orders__#_-__Click.description: Total new-to-brand orders within clicks in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Sales_-__Click.description: Total new-to-brand sales within clicks in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Units__#_-__Click.description: Total new-to-brand units within clicks in the last 14 days
